trans-unit.source: Represents a connection to a data store in a design tool.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma conexão a um repositório de dados em uma ferramenta de design.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataConnection object represents a connection to a data store in the design tool.
trans-unit.target: O objeto DesignerDataConnection representa uma conexão a um repositório de dados na ferramenta de design.

trans-unit.source: Typically a DesignerDataConnection object is returned as part of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.Connections%2A> property, and is created either by reading the application's configuration file or by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.BuildConnection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente um objeto DesignerDataConnection é retornado como parte do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.Connections%2A>propriedade e é criada lendo o arquivo de configuração do aplicativo ou ao chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.BuildConnection%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.BuildConnection%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.Connections%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"></xref> class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado, o provedor de dados e a cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> objects that are not created from the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection>objetos que não são criados de arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection>

trans-unit.source: When you use this constructor, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa este construtor o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>está definida como `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name associated with this connection.
trans-unit.target: O nome associado a esta conexão.

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider object used to access the underlying data store
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto de provedor usado para acessar o repositório de dados subjacente

trans-unit.source: The string that specifies how to connect to the data store.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que especifica a conexão com o repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"></xref> class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string, and indicates whether the connection was loaded from a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado, o provedor de dados e a cadeia de caracteres de conexão e indica se a conexão foi carregado de um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when you need to specify the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> property, such as when you are creating a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object from information stored in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor quando você precisa especificar o valor da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>propriedade, como quando você estiver criando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection>objeto de informações armazenadas no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> property is set to the value of the `isConfigured` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>propriedade é definida como o valor de `isConfigured` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name associated with this connection.
trans-unit.target: O nome associado a esta conexão.

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider object used to access the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto de provedor usado para acessar o repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The string that specifies how to connect to the data store.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que especifica a conexão com o repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the connection was created from information stored in the application's configuration file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a conexão foi criado com as informações armazenadas no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application connection string defined for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de conexão de aplicativo definida para a conexão.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property contains the connection string used by the application for connecting to the data store.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ConnectionString contém a cadeia de conexão usada pelo aplicativo para se conectar ao repositório de dados.

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetDesignTimeConnection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to return a connection string suitable for use in the design environment.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetDesignTimeConnection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para retornar uma cadeia de caracteres de conexão adequado para uso no ambiente de design.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetDesignTimeConnection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The application connection string defined for the connection.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de conexão de aplicativo definida para a conexão.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the connection information is in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as informações de conexão no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The IsConfigured property will be `true` if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object was read from the application's configuration file, or if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object was written to the application's configuration file by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsConfigured será `true` se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection>objeto foram lidos no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo, ou se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection>objeto foi gravado para o arquivo de configuração do aplicativo, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection>

trans-unit.source: When the IsConfigured is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.Name%2A> property is set to the name of the connection as defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Quando o IsConfigured é `true`, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.Name%2A>propriedade está definida como o nome da conexão, conforme definido no [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) do arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection is defined in the application's configuration file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a conexão é definido no arquivo de configuração do aplicativo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da conexão de dados.

trans-unit.source: The Name property contains the name that identifies a specific connection in an application configuration file or a list of data connections.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome contém o nome que identifica uma conexão específica em um arquivo de configuração do aplicativo ou uma lista de conexões de dados.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> property is `true`, Name property is used as the `name` attribute in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration element, or is returned from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>é de propriedade `true`, propriedade de nome é usada como o `name` atributo no [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) elemento de configuração, ou é retornado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data connection.
trans-unit.target: O nome da conexão de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the provider used to access the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do provedor usado para acessar o repositório de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider used to access the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: O nome do provedor usado para acessar o repositório de dados subjacente.
